title: Competency-Based Mathematical Problem Solving: Mobile Microlearning Focused on Authentic Learning

context.additional_context: A professional development program for pre-service or in-service teachers focusing on enhancing teaching competencies in a BYOD environment, with an emphasis on developing problem-solving skills in mathematics linked to real-world professional contexts.

learning_goals: Learners can solve real-world workplace mathematical problems with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can conduct real-case analyses at least three times using collaborative tools with peers.
Learners can self-evaluate and improve their problem-solving processes in three stages through formative assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
